articles.title: Lung cancer isn’t just a smoker’s disease, say oncologists and warn on early signs this awareness month - Times of India
articles.description: Lung Cancer Awareness Month highlights that this disease isn't just for smokers; pollution and genetics also play a role. Early symptoms like a persis

articles.title: Diplo shares selfie with Katy Perry and Justin Trudeau after claiming he dated both - Times of India
articles.description: Diplo shares a cheeky selfie with Katy Perry and Justin Trudeau, claiming he dated both. The playful post sparks reactions online as fans catch the humor behind the DJ's words. Read more about this unexpected celebrity moment.
